title: India, UK Ministers Discuss Plan To Take Forward Talks On Free Trade Deal
content: Commerce and Industry Minister Piyush Goyal met UK Secretary of State for Business and Trade Jonathan Reynolds in Italy and discussed plans to take forward the negotiations on the proposed free trade agreement, an official statement said on Wednesday
summary: Commerce and Industry Minister Piyush Goyal met UK Secretary of State for Business and Trade Jonathan Reynolds in Italy and discussed plans to take forward the negotiations on the proposed free trade agreement, an official statement said on Wednesday

title: Fire Breaks Out At China Mall With People Trapped Inside, Doused: Report
content: A fire that broke out Wednesday in a shopping centre in southwestern China was extinguished but some people were still trapped inside, state broadcaster CCTV said.
summary: A fire that broke out Wednesday in a shopping centre in southwestern China was extinguished but some people were still trapped inside, state broadcaster CCTV said.

title: US Woman Arrested For Sitting On Foster Son, 10, That Caused His Death
content: According to court documents, the foster mother is now accused of sitting on the youngster outside her house in an attempt to stop him from "acting up."
summary: According to court documents, the foster mother is now accused of sitting on the youngster outside her house in an attempt to stop him from "acting up."

title: Old Video Showing Trump Shooter Getting Bullied In School Surfaces
content: Twenty-year-old Thomas Matthew Crooks from Bethel Park, Pennsylvania, shot at former US President Donald Trump with an AR-15 rifle at a rally in Butler on July 13.

title: Trump Shooter Had Detonator On Him, May Have Planned A Distraction: Report

title: US Man Jumps In Ocean To Avoid Giving Girlfriend, Cops His Phone Password
content: He told the cops that he would "swim home."

title: Watch: How A Chart On Immigration From Biden's Regime Saved Trump's Life
content: A head tilt to see a chart microseconds before the bullet's impact saved former US President Donald Trump from certain death.
summary: A head tilt to see a chart microseconds before the bullet's impact saved former US President Donald Trump from certain death.

title: All You Need To Know About New UK Government's Key Policy Plans
content: Britain's new Labour government set out its first package of proposed laws on Wednesday as Prime Minister Keir Starmer tries to deliver on his promise to rebuild the country.

title: Trump Recalls Shooting, Says Bullet "Felt Like World's Largest Mosquito"

title: India's Elite Dog Squad K9 Units To Heighten Security At Paris Olympics
content: Two K9 teams from the Central Reserve Police Force (CRPF) have reached Paris as part of the 10 K9 teams from various organisations selected to provide security to various venues of the upcoming Paris Olympics 2024, scheduled from July 26 to August 1
summary: Two K9 teams from the Central Reserve Police Force (CRPF) have reached Paris as part of the 10 K9 teams from various organisations selected to provide security to various venues of the upcoming Paris Olympics 2024, scheduled from July 26 to August 1

title: "Thought It Was A Rusty Bolt": 13-Year-Old Stumbles Upon Roman-Era Ring
content: The ring, preserved in its entirety, features the image of a helmeted naked figure holding a shield in one hand and a spear in the other.
summary: The ring, preserved in its entirety, features the image of a helmeted naked figure holding a shield in one hand and a spear in the other.

title: US Presidential Election 2024 And Its Double India Connection
content: As the world prepares for what's likely to be a neck-and-neck contest between Joe Biden and Donald Trump in US polls, there's another aspect of these elections worth taking note of - its India connection.

title: How A Small-Town Kannadiga Brought India Its 1st Miss Universe Petite Crown
content: Imagine doing a 36-hour shift in a hospital and then turning up willingly the next day to chip away the imperfections to become a beauty queen? That is what Shruti Hegde, a doctor and a beauty queen from Hubli, Karnataka, has been doing since 2018.
summary: Imagine doing a 36-hour shift in a hospital and then turning up willingly the next day to chip away the imperfections to become a beauty queen? That is what Shruti Hegde, a doctor and a beauty queen from Hubli, Karnataka, has been doing since 2018.

title: Prince Harry, Meghan Markle Break 64-Year Royal Tradition In Surprise Move
content: In a significant departure from tradition, Prince Harry and Meghan Markle have changed the surnames of their children. Recently, the couple launched its new website, sussex.com, where many noticed the change, the Mirror reported.
summary: In a significant departure from tradition, Prince Harry and Meghan Markle have changed the surnames of their children. Recently, the couple launched its new website, sussex.com, where many noticed the change, the Mirror reported.

title: Trump's Fossil Fuel Agenda Gets Priority Over Climate Change At Convention
content: Climate change is little more than an afterthought for attendees at the Republican National Convention, who are gathered this week to crown Donald Trump as their party's nominee for this November's election.

title: "I Divorce You... Your Ex-Wife": Dubai Princess Dumps Husband In Insta Post
content: Shaikha Mahra Bint Mohammed Bin Rashid Al Maktoum, the daughter of Dubai's ruler, has publicly declared "divorce" from her husband, Sheikh Mana Bin Mohammed Bin Rashid bin Mana Al Maktoum, on Instagram.

title: Acropolis In Athens Shut For Several Hours Daily. Heat Is The Reason
content: Greece's most visited tourist attraction, the Athens Acropolis, is to close during the hottest hours of Wednesday, authorities said as a heatwave scorches the country.
summary: Greece's most visited tourist attraction, the Athens Acropolis, is to close during the hottest hours of Wednesday, authorities said as a heatwave scorches the country.

title: Women Shouldn't Be In Secret Service, Says US Right Wing Post Trump Shooting
content: As questions swirl over how a would-be assassin managed to get anywhere near Donald Trump, some conservatives are blaming the Secret Service for hiring the women agents who threw themselves into the line of fire to protect the former president.
summary: As questions swirl over how a would-be assassin managed to get anywhere near Donald Trump, some conservatives are blaming the Secret Service for hiring the women agents who threw themselves into the line of fire to protect the former president.

title: "This Is The Final Straw": Elon Musk Moving X And SpaceX Out Of California
content: San Francisco, July 17 (IANS) Tesla and SpaceX CEO Elon Musk on Wednesday said he will move the headquarters of its aerospace company as well as social media platform X from the US state of California.
summary: San Francisco, July 17 (IANS) Tesla and SpaceX CEO Elon Musk on Wednesday said he will move the headquarters of its aerospace company as well as social media platform X from the US state of California.

title: Iran Rejects US Accusations Of Any Involvement In Trump Assassination Bid
content: Iran on Wednesday rejected what it called "malicious" accusations by US media implicating it in a plot to kill former US president Donald Trump.
summary: Iran on Wednesday rejected what it called "malicious" accusations by US media implicating it in a plot to kill former US president Donald Trump.
